short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts prices in your browser from US dollars to Bitcoin

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you a Bitcoin enthusiast looking for an easy way to stay updated on the latest prices? Look no further than The Bitcoin Standard Chrome Extension! This extension seamlessly integrates into your browsing experience and allows you to easily convert prices in your browser from USD to Bitcoin (BTC) and Satoshis (sats) with a simple hover.
This is a perfect tool for both casual and professional users who want to stay informed about the cryptocurrency market. You will no longer have to manually calculate conversions or navigate away from the website you're on.
Moreover, with the ability to toggle between original price, BTC, and sats, you'll have the flexibility to compare prices in different currencies and make more informed decisions.
Give this extension a try and see how effortless it is to stay up to date with the latest Bitcoin prices. It's a must-have for anyone interested in the cryptocurrency market.
